overview: This is the first part of the little trilogy PHANTASUS MUSS ANDERS WERDEN; WHAT HAPPENED TO MAGDALENA JUNG?; and TUNGUSKA â€“ DIE KISTEN SIND DA (1983/84). The first two shorts were firstly shown at a counter-event of the "Westdeutschen Kurzfilmtage" (short film festival) in 1983. This event was also connected with the slogan "Freedom for Christian S.", who was a popular anti-fascist at this time.
title: Phantasus go home
